section.name: Welcome
section.p: Welcome to JES - if you can see this page, the first steps of installation are complete. Follow the 'installation tests' links on the menu to run diagnostics on the installation

section.name: Overview
section.p: The Astrogrid Job Execution System (JES) is a workflow engine: it executes science worflows which query datasets (DSA) , perform computations (CEA) and load and save results (Myspace).
You might want to install a JES server to execute workflows developed by a local community of users. However, this isn't necessary - any other available jes server could be used.
Of the server-side components of Astrogrid, JES is the most complex - it will or may interact with all other server-side AG components - Registry, Community, Filemanager, FileStore and CEA services.
